channel.title: Homes on Motonari Kambara
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Motonari Kambara

item.description: Hello! I am Motonari Kambara. I am currently a Ph.D. student in Information and Computer Science at Keio University. My academic and research interests are deeply rooted in the intersection of Vision and Language (V&L), as well as the development and application of domestic service robots.
